scripts.build: npx esbuild --format=cjs --target=node20 --platform=node --bundle --outfile=bundle.js ./auth/app.js && node --experimental-sea-config sea-config.json && node -e "require('fs').copyFileSync(process.execPath, 'GMAuth.exe')" && npx postject GMAuth.exe NODE_SEA_BLOB sea-prep.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2
